Description: Body sherd of East Greek grey ware pottery stand; dark grey fabric core and beige-grey surface, large quantity of mica; worn dark grey to brown slip, and inscription, on exterior.
Curator's comments: Modern incised inscription 'Hera' on interior indicates (possible) findspot. Sherd joins British Museum 1888,0601.613.b
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GL.064)
